Translations.Text: Dangshi, ni zai zaochen cong jiali chuqu, ba xinshimen bu zhi zai zhendi shang. Zhenzhu shi quan cong de, shi quanzhi de.
Dangshi, nimen zhong you liang huo ren yao xiang shiruo; danshi zhenzhu shi tamen de baoyou zhe. Xinshimen zhi xintuo zhenzhu ba!
Bai de'er zhi yi, nimen shi wu shili de, er zhenzhu que yi yuanzhule nimen. Gu nimen yingdang jingwei zhenzhu, yibian nimen ganxie.
Dangshi, ni dui xinshimen shuo:`Nimen de zhu jiangxia tianshen sanqian lai yuanzhu nimen, hai bugou ma?
Buran, ruguo nimen jianren, bingqie jingwei, er diren like lai gong nimen, namo, nimen de zhu, jiang shi xiji de tianshen wuqian lai yuanzhu nimen.'
Zhenzhu zhi yi zhe yingxu dui nimen baoxi, yibian nimen de xinjing yinci er anding. Yuanzhu zhishi cong wanneng de, zhi rui de zhen zhu nali jiangxia de.
(Ta yuanzhu nimen), yibian duiyu bu xindao de ren, huo jianchu yibufen, huo quandou jiayi lingru, yibian tamen shibai er gui.
Tamen que shi buyi de, zhenzhu huo jiayi she you, huo jiayi chengfa, ni duiyu zhe jian shi, shi wu quan guowen de.
Tiandi wanwu, dou shi zhenzhu de. Ta yao shu rao shui, jiu shu rao shui; yao chengfa shui, jiu chengfa shui. Zhenzhu shi zhi she de, shi zhi ci de.
